briefdescription.para: returns the ECDSA key name ("ecdsa-sha2-nistp256" for example)

parameterdescription.para: the ssh_key whose ECDSA name to get

simplesect.para: the ECDSA key name ("ecdsa-sha2-nistp256" for example)
"unknown" if the ECDSA key name is not known

briefdescription.para: creates a new empty SSH key

simplesect.para: an empty ssh_key handle, or NULL on error.

briefdescription.para: clean up the key and deallocate all existing keys

parameterdescription.para: ssh_key to clean

briefdescription.para: deallocate a SSH key

parameterdescription.para: ssh_key handle to free

briefdescription.para: returns the type of a ssh key

parameterdescription.para: the ssh_key handle

simplesect.para: one of SSH_KEYTYPE_RSA, SSH_KEYTYPE_DSS, SSH_KEYTYPE_ECDSA_P256, SSH_KEYTYPE_ECDSA_P384, SSH_KEYTYPE_ECDSA_P521, SSH_KEYTYPE_ED25519, SSH_KEYTYPE_DSS_CERT01, SSH_KEYTYPE_RSA_CERT01, SSH_KEYTYPE_ECDSA_P256_CERT01, SSH_KEYTYPE_ECDSA_P384_CERT01, SSH_KEYTYPE_ECDSA_P521_CERT01, or SSH_KEYTYPE_ED25519_CERT01.
SSH_KEYTYPE_UNKNOWN if the type is unknown

briefdescription.para: Convert a signature type to a string.

parameterdescription.para: The algorithm type to convert.

simplesect.para: A string for the keytype or NULL if unknown.

briefdescription.para: Convert a key type to a string.

parameterdescription.para: The type to convert.

simplesect.para: A string for the keytype or NULL if unknown.

briefdescription.para: Checks the given key against the configured allowed public key algorithm types.

parameterdescription.para: The SSH session
The key algorithm to check

simplesect.para: 1 if the key algorithm is allowed, 0 otherwise

briefdescription.para: Convert a key type to a hash type. This is usually unambiguous for all the key types, unless the SHA2 extension (RFC 8332) is negotiated during key exchange.

parameterdescription.para: SSH Session.
The type to convert.

simplesect.para: A hash type to be used.

briefdescription.para: Gets signature algorithm name to be used with the given key type.

parameterdescription.para: SSH session.
The algorithm type to convert.

simplesect.para: A string for the keytype or NULL if unknown.

briefdescription.para: Convert a ssh key algorithm name to a ssh key algorithm type.

parameterdescription.para: The name to convert.

simplesect.para: The enum ssh key algorithm type.

briefdescription.para: Convert a ssh key name to a ssh key type.

parameterdescription.para: The name to convert.

simplesect.para: The enum ssh key type.

briefdescription.para: Get the pubic key type corresponding to a certificate type.

parameterdescription.para: The certificate or public key type.

simplesect.para: The matching public key type.

briefdescription.para: Check if the key has/is a public key.

parameterdescription.para: The key to check.

simplesect.para: 1 if it is a public key, 0 if not.

briefdescription.para: Check if the key is a private key.

parameterdescription.para: The key to check.

simplesect.para: 1 if it is a private key, 0 if not.

memberdef.argsstring: (const ssh_key k1, const ssh_key k2, enum ssh_keycmp_e what)
memberdef.name: ssh_key_cmp

briefdescription.para: Compare keys if they are equal.

parameterdescription.para: The first key to compare.
The second key to compare.
What part or type of the key do you want to compare.

simplesect.para: 0 if equal, 1 if not.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *b64_key, const char *passphrase, ssh_auth_callback auth_fn, void *auth_data, ssh_key *pkey)
memberdef.name: ssh_pki_import_privkey_base64

briefdescription.para: import a base64 formated key from a memory c-string

parameterdescription.para: The c-string holding the base64 encoded key
The passphrase to decrypt the key, or NULL
An auth function you may want to use or NULL.
Private data passed to the auth function.
A pointer where the allocated key can be stored. You need to free the memory.

simplesect.para: SSH_ERROR in case of error, SSH_OK otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const ssh_key privkey, const char *passphrase, ssh_auth_callback auth_fn, void *auth_data, char **b64_key)
memberdef.name: ssh_pki_export_privkey_base64

briefdescription.para: Convert a private key to a pem base64 encoded key, or OpenSSH format for keytype ssh-ed25519.

parameterdescription.para: The private key to export.
The passphrase to use to encrypt the key with or NULL. An empty string means no passphrase.
An auth function you may want to use or NULL.
Private data passed to the auth function.
A pointer to store the allocated base64 encoded key. You need to free the buffer.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR on error.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *filename, const char *passphrase, ssh_auth_callback auth_fn, void *auth_data, ssh_key *pkey)
memberdef.name: ssh_pki_import_privkey_file

briefdescription.para: Import a key from a file.

parameterdescription.para: The filename of the the private key.
The passphrase to decrypt the private key. Set to NULL if none is needed or it is unknown.
An auth function you may want to use or NULL.
Private data passed to the auth function.
A pointer to store the allocated ssh_key. You need to free the key.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_EOF if the file doesn't exist or permission denied, SSH_ERROR otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const ssh_key privkey, const char *passphrase, ssh_auth_callback auth_fn, void *auth_data, const char *filename)
memberdef.name: ssh_pki_export_privkey_file

briefdescription.para: Export a private key to a pem file on disk, or OpenSSH format for keytype ssh-ed25519.

parameterdescription.para: The private key to export.
The passphrase to use to encrypt the key with or NULL. An empty string means no passphrase.
An auth function you may want to use or NULL.
Private data passed to the auth function.
The path where to store the pem file.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR on error.

briefdescription.para: Import a base64 formated public key from a memory c-string.

parameterdescription.para: The base64 key to format.
The type of the key to format.
A pointer where the allocated key can be stored. You need to free the memory.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR on error.

briefdescription.para: Detect if the pathname in cmp is a PKCS #11 URI.

parameterdescription.para: The path to the public/private key or a private/public PKCS #11 URI.

simplesect.para: true if filename is a URI starting with "pkcs11:" false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: export a Public PKCS #11 URI from a Private PKCS #11 URI by replacing "type=private" to "type=public". TODO: Improve the parser

parameterdescription.para: Private PKCS #11 URI.

simplesect.para: pointer to the public PKCS #11 URI

briefdescription.para: Import a public key from the given filename.

parameterdescription.para: The path to the public key.
A pointer to store the allocated public key. You need to free the memory.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_EOF if the file doesn't exist or permission denied, SSH_ERROR otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Import a base64 formated certificate from a memory c-string.

parameterdescription.para: The base64 cert to format.
The type of the cert to format.
A pointer where the allocated key can be stored. You need to free the memory.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR on error.

briefdescription.para: Import a certificate from the given filename.

parameterdescription.para: The path to the certificate.
A pointer to store the allocated certificate. You need to free the memory.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_EOF if the file doesn't exist or permission denied, SSH_ERROR otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Generates a keypair.

parameterdescription.para: Type of key to create
Parameter to the creation of key: rsa : length of the key in bits (e.g. 1024, 2048, 4096) dsa : length of the key in bits (e.g. 1024, 2048, 3072)
A pointer to store the allocated private key. You need to free the memory.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR on error.
Generating a key pair may take some time.

briefdescription.para: Create a public key from a private key.

parameterdescription.para: The private key to get the public key from.
A pointer to store the newly allocated public key. You NEED to free the key.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR on error.

briefdescription.para: Convert a public key to a base64 encoded key.

parameterdescription.para: The key to hash
A pointer to store the allocated base64 encoded key. You need to free the buffer.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR on error.

briefdescription.para: Copy the certificate part of a public key into a private key.

parameterdescription.para: The certificate key.
The target private key to copy the certificate to.

simplesect.para: SSH_OK on success, SSH_ERROR otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Functions for the creation, importation and manipulation of public and private keys in the context of the SSH protocol
